Bold is a group of storytellers, artists, filmmakers and entrepreneurs brought together by a simple passion: to create the kind of brands that we'd like to see in the world - the ones that people actually care about.

We’re not ad people. We grew up on the internet, honed our craft on youtube, built our business on instagram and cut our teeth pulling all nighters, turning tiny budgets into big ideas.

Over the last decade, we have helped some of the most ambitious brands on the planet to embrace a new world by connecting them to a culture that is changing by the second.

Ideas are nothing without execution. We are built with production at our core and we're wired for making, not just dreaming. Our model cuts out all the slow, fatty trappings of traditional agencies and shapes everything we do. We think big, talk straight, move fast and punch above our weight. We make work that we believe in with people we believe in, join partners in the trenches, live and die by our results, sweat every single pixel, click and comma and follow our gut - even when it hurts.

And we give a sh*t, like actually give a sh*t, not just about you or your brand, but about the people you’re trying to connect with. We’re not interested in adding more noise to the world. That’s not us. Everything we do is about bringing a bit of magic to someone’s day, creating work that stops you in your tracks, pulling you out of one world and dropping you into another.
